chapters.title: Understanding Exchange-Traded Funds (ETFs)
chapters.summary: This chapter provides an overview of what ETFs are, their structure, and how they work in the financial markets.

chapters.title: Introduction to ETFs
chapters.summary: An introductory guide to ETFs, explaining their origins, evolution, and different types available to investors.

chapters.title: Benefits of Investing in ETFs
chapters.summary: This chapter explores the various advantages of ETFs, including diversification, liquidity, and lower costs compared to other investment options.

chapters.title: ETFs vs. Mutual Funds: A Comparative Analysis
chapters.summary: A detailed comparison between ETFs and mutual funds, highlighting the differences in structure, trading, and performance.
